body.p: Ive recied your two letters to day I regret not having the money to pay our note -- If in our power -- to get the 3000$ by first of May It shall be done, rest ashured that every Exurshin on our part shall be used to pay the note off. as far as possable every thing is so uncurtin at this time, there is no telling what one can do
I have in this county Forty two Thousand Dollars due me can not collect a Dollar.
